name: Facebook - Dark Shiny Transparency [with Options]
description:
This is a new version of Style 11922 that offers choices using some CSS effects that may be taxing on your computer

Facebook: http://fb.me/DaedalusIcarusHelios.themes

Requires Firefox 4.0 or newer for newer CSS 3 features

I have replicated the original background image using multiple components for background including gradients.
additional_info:
10/4/16 - Numerous fixes where things where white instead of dark
10/14/15 - Fixed comment text color
5/28/15 - Misc. fixes
4/11/14 - Fixes for FB changes, added carbon fiber texture overlay option
12/8/13 - Numerous fixes
4/12/13 - Misc. fixes
1/22/13 - Fixes for mail, chat status, etc.
12/7/12 - Fixed update status box, some things in the feed, etc.
9/11/12 - Fixed several things
6/27/12 - Fixed layout issue (content was shifted to the far right)
6/23/12 - Several more fixes (width fix when using Social Fixer, trending stories, etc.)
6/17/12 - More fixes (trending stories, etc.)
6/13/12 - Fixed wall text, shared items, etc.
3/17/12 - More fixes, more code cleanup
3/16/12 - New options; numerous fixes/changes/code cleanup
2/23/12 - Misc. fixes, groups banner at top fixed, security button for posts, some code cleanup
2/20/12 - Multiple fixes, some code clean up, shiny metallic now properly seems to shift when scrolling
2/12/12 - Some Timeline fixes, Page insights, other misc. fixes
1/28/12 - Various fixes
